name: Eco-Friendly Estonia
title: Lowest CO2 Emissions from Waste
description: In 2023, Estonia achieved the lowest carbon dioxide emissions from waste globally, with a mere 0.0001 Mt CO2e. This highlights the country's commitment to environmental sustainability.

name: Water Works Wonders
title: Industry Dominates Freshwater Use
description: In 2021, Estonia's industrial sector accounted for 92.29% of the country's total freshwater withdrawals, indicating a strong industrial presence and reliance on water resources.

name: Transparent Transactions
title: High Quality of Public Services and Transparency
description: Estonia scored 84.97 in 2024 for the quality of public services and transparency in business locations, showcasing its commitment to efficient governance and business-friendly environments.

name: Corruption Control Champs
title: Low Standard Error in Corruption Control
description: In 2023, Estonia reported a low standard error of 0.145 in its control of corruption, reflecting a stable and transparent governance system.

name: Fertile Grounds
title: High Fertilizer Consumption
description: Estonia's fertilizer consumption was 22973.71% of its production in 2022, indicating a robust agricultural sector that heavily relies on fertilizers.

name: Patent Paucity
title: Minimal Nonresident Patent Applications
description: In 2021, Estonia had only 1 patent application from nonresidents, suggesting limited international patent activity.

name: Aid Austerity
title: Low Net ODA to Least Developed Countries
description: In 2022, Estonia provided $490,000 in net official development assistance to the least developed countries, indicating a modest contribution to global aid efforts.
